complaint.description: My 3 lines were affected due to them not updating the account changes. I called them to sort it out, however, the EFT payment has taken over 7 days to reflect and now my line is locked. Customer care are robots, they read all questions and apply no care towards customers.
complaint.suggestion: Improve customer care by providing more personalized and attentive support. Ensure that account changes are updated promptly and efficiently.

meta.review_title: Poor customer care and putting customers at risk
